 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלָטָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==thick darkness== **\*\***&lt; darkness, dusk, which suits both passages (Bevan, privately). (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלָטָה‎</span> (rare); according to [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 5</sup> transposes from Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [***be cloudy***]; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***darkness***); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span>, attending sunset [[Gen.15.17|Gen 15:17]] (with verb masculine; [[BDB#Albr.|Albr]]<sup>ZAW xv (1895), 325</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>Synt. § 350 e</sup> read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָֽיְתָה‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּע‎</span> [[Ezek.12.7|Ezek 12:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעֶרֶב‎</span>), v[[Ezek.12.6|Ezek 12:6]] v[[Ezek.12.12|Ezek 12:12]]. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵלִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֱלִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִלִּי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלִיָּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶלְיוֺן‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלה‎</span>. p. 750f<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵי‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלְיָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלְיָן‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלוה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלוז‎</span>.p.752
